title: Navaratna Kempu Kundan Studs - Auspicious Flower Earrings
materials: all set in Kundan style. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These earrings showcase the traditional Navaratna setting in a contemporary floral design. Each petal of the flower features a different gemstone, representing the nine celestial influences. The central Ruby (Kempu) is surrounded by carefully selected gemstones. The Kundan setting adds a touch of vintage charm, while the stud style offers modern wearability.
colors: with a vibrant spectrum of colors from the gemstones: Ruby Red
occasions: or as an auspicious gift. Suitable for traditional ceremonies like pujas
or even paired with modern attire for a touch of cultural elegance. They are perfect for functions like haldi and mehendi ceremonies.
description: These Navaratna earrings are more than just jewelry; they're a symbol of prosperity and well-being. The combination of traditional Kundan craftsmanship and modern design makes them versatile and unique. The vibrant gemstones are carefully selected for their quality and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability, ensuring these earrings become a cherished heirloom.
